items.title: Venezuela swears in interim president after defiant Maduro pleads not guilty in US court
items.title_zh: 委内瑞拉在叛逆的马杜罗在美国法院认罪后,
items.summary: Delcy Rodriguez has been sworn in as Venezuela's interim president in a parliamentary session that began with demands for the release from US custody of ousted leader Nicolas Maduro.
items.summary_zh: Delcy Rodriguez已宣誓就任委内瑞拉临时总统,

items.title: Cuba defiant as it braces for post-Maduro era
items.title_zh: 古巴在马杜罗后时代的坚守中不屈
items.summary: After Venezuela, there is no nation in the Americas more affected by the events in Caracas than Cuba.
items.summary_zh: 委内瑞拉之后,在美洲,受加拉加斯事件影响最大的国家莫过于古巴.

items.title: Watch: What it was like in the courtroom at Maduro's hearing
items.title_zh: 监视 : 马杜罗的听证会上法庭上的情况
items.summary: Nicolas Maduro, former president of Venezuela, made his first court appearance in New York City after his capture by US forces in Caracas on 3 January.
items.summary_zh: 委内瑞拉前总统尼古拉斯·马杜罗于1月3日在加拉加斯被美军攻克后,首次出道于纽约市.

items.title: US sharply criticised by foes and friends over Maduro seizure
items.title_zh: 美国对马杜罗抓获的敌人和朋友尖锐批评
items.summary: The US seizing of Venezuela's leader has faced strong criticism from both America's friends and foes at an emergency meeting of the United Nations Security Council.
items.summary_zh: 美国抓住委内瑞拉领导人在联合国安全理事会紧急会议上遭到美国朋友和敌人的强烈批评。

items.title: 'I'm a prisoner of war' - In the room for Maduro's dramatic court hearing
items.title_zh: 我是战俘 在马杜罗戏剧性的庭审室里
items.summary: The sound of clanking leg shackles could be heard moments before Venezuelan leader Nicolás Maduro walked into the door of a New York City courtroom for the first time.
items.summary_zh: 委内瑞拉领导人Nicolás Maduro第一次走入纽约市法庭门前,

items.title: Trump's seizure of Maduro raises thorny legal questions, in US and abroad
items.title_zh: 特朗普夺取马杜罗在美国和国外引起了棘手的法律问题
items.summary: On Monday morning, a handcuffed, jumpsuit-clad Nicholas Maduro stepped off a military helicopter in New York City, flanked by armed federal agents.
items.summary_zh: 星期一上午,一名戴着手铐的穿高衣的尼古拉斯·马杜罗(Nicholas Maduro)从纽约市的一架军用直升机上下车,由联邦武装特工从侧翼.

items.title: Thirty-two Cubans killed during US attack on Venezuela
items.title_zh: 三十二名古巴人在美军进攻委内瑞拉时丧生
items.summary: The Cuban government says 32 of its nationals were killed during the US operation to seize Venezuelan leader Nicolás Maduro.
items.summary_zh: 古巴政府称其32名国民在美国抓捕委内瑞拉领导人尼古拉斯·马杜罗的行动中被击毙.

items.title: All 116 injured in Swiss ski resort fire identified
items.title_zh: 瑞士滑雪胜地火灾中所有116人受伤
items.summary: All 116 people injured in a bar fire at a Swiss ski resort have now been identified, officials have said.
items.summary_zh: 所有116人在瑞士滑雪胜地的酒吧火灾中受伤,

items.title: 'We need Greenland': Trump repeats threat to annex Danish territory
items.title_zh: '我们需要格陵兰':特朗普再三威胁吞并丹麦领土.
items.summary: Donald Trump has again proposed annexing Greenland, after Denmark's leader urged him to "stop the threats" over the island.
items.summary_zh: 唐纳德·特朗普再次提议吞并格陵兰,此前丹麦领导人敦促他"停止对该岛的威胁".

items.title: Ten found guilty of cyber-bullying Brigitte Macron
items.title_zh: 10人被判网络欺负Brigitte Macron有罪
items.summary: Ten people have been found guilty of cyber-bullying Brigitte Macron, the wife of French President Emmanuel Macron, by a Paris court.
items.summary_zh: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔·马克龙的妻子布里吉特·马克龙被巴黎法院判定网络欺凌罪十人.

items.title: South Korea's Lee Jae Myung meets China's Xi as he seeks to reset ties
items.title_zh: 韩国的李载明在寻求重设联系时认识了中国的习近平
items.summary: South Korea's President Lee Jae Myung is meeting Chinese leader Xi Jinping as he seeks to reset frayed ties with his country's biggest trading partner.
items.summary_zh: 韩国国家主席李载明会见中国领导人习近平 寻求与国内最大贸易伙伴重塑裂痕.

items.title: Bluefin tuna fetches record $3.2m at Tokyo auction
items.title_zh: 蓝鳍金枪鱼在东京拍卖会上获得320万美元的记录
items.summary: A bulky bluefin tuna made a splash at Tokyo's Toyosu fish market on Monday morning, fetching a record 510.3 million yen ($3.2m; £2.4m) at the market's first auction of the year.
items.summary_zh: 一艘大块的蓝鳍金枪鱼于星期一上午在东京丰顺鱼市场出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海入海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海入海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出海出

items.title: Trump warns new Venezuelan leader as Maduro set to appear in court
items.title_zh: 川普警告新委内瑞拉领导人马杜罗即将出庭
items.summary: Donald Trump has warned Venezuela's new leader Delcy Rodríguez she could "pay a very big price, probably bigger than Maduro" if she "doesn't do what's right".
items.summary_zh: 唐纳德·特朗普警告委内瑞拉新领导人德西·罗德里格斯,如果她"不做正确的事",她可以"付出非常大的代价,可能比马杜罗还大".

items.title: The French university where spies go for training
items.title_zh: 间谍去法国大学训练
items.summary: University professor Xavier Crettiez admits that he doesn't know the real names of many of the students on his course.
items.summary_zh: 大学教授Xavier Crettiez承认他不知道他课程上许多学生的真实姓名.

items.title: Raw emotions as mourners attend Mass for Swiss bar fire victims
items.title_zh: 瑞士酒吧火灾受害者弥撒时,
items.summary: In the snow-dusted street outside St Christopher's Church, hundreds joined a special Sunday Mass for the victims of the fire that tore through Le Constellation bar on New Year's Eve.
items.summary_zh: 在圣克里斯托弗教堂外的被雪弄的街道上,有上百人加入了特别的"周日弥撒",为元旦夜通过"星座"酒吧撕裂的火灾受害者.

items.title: At least 30 killed in attack on Nigeria village
items.title_zh: 在袭击尼日利亚村庄时至少30人被炸死
items.summary: Armed men have violently stormed a village in Nigeria's Niger state, killing at least 30 people and looting shops, state authorities have said.
items.summary_zh: 武装分子暴力袭击了尼日利亚尼日尔州一村庄,造成至少30人死亡并抢劫商店,州当局表示.

items.title: Who is Cilia Flores, Venezuela's first lady seized by the US?
items.title_zh: Cilia Flores是谁 委内瑞拉第一夫人被美国抓走?
items.summary: When US forces conducted a night raid on the Venezuelan capital Caracas, they didn't just drag President Nicolás Maduro from his compound and put him on a flight to New York - they took his wife too.
items.summary_zh: 当美军对委内瑞拉首都加拉加斯进行夜间突袭时,他们不仅将尼科拉斯·马杜罗总统从他的院子拖出,并把他送上飞往纽约的航班——他们还带走了他的妻子.

items.title: Activist group says it was behind Berlin fire that cut power to thousands
items.title_zh: 积极分子组织说,正是柏林大火的后方 切断了成千上万的电力
items.summary: A far-left activist group in Germany has claimed responsibility for a suspected arson attack that left tens of thousands of homes, as well as hospitals and businesses, without power in around-freezing temperatures.
items.summary_zh: 德国一极左翼的活动团体声称对一起被怀疑为纵火袭击负责,这次袭击使数以万计的房屋以及医院和企业在周围被冻结的温度中失去动力.

items.title: From Caracas 'fort' to New York court: Maduro's capture in pictures and maps
items.title_zh: 从加拉加斯'fort'到纽约法庭:马杜罗在图片和地图上的捕捉
items.summary: The US says its military operation to capture Venezuela's president took months of planning, but when Donald Trump gave the order to launch, "Operation Absolute Resolve" only lasted about 150 minutes.
items.summary_zh: 美国称其抓捕委内瑞拉总统的军事行动花费了数月的计划时间,但当唐纳德·特朗普下达发动命令后"绝对决心行动"只持续了约150分钟.

items.title: Bowen: Trump's action could set precedent for authoritarian powers across globe
items.title_zh: 博文:特朗普的行动可以为全球的专制权力开创先例.
items.summary: With the seizure of Venezuelan leader Nicolás Maduro, Donald Trump has demonstrated more powerfully than ever his belief in the power of his will, backed by raw US military force. On his orders the US has Maduro behind bars and now will "run" Venezuela.
items.summary_zh: 随着委内瑞拉领导人尼科拉斯·马杜罗被夺取,唐纳德·特朗普在生前的美国军事力量支持下,比以往更有力地展示了他对意志力量的信念. 根据他的命令,美国将马杜罗关入监狱,现在将"跑"委内瑞拉.

items.title: Thousands stranded across Europe as Greece airspace disrupted
items.title_zh: 随着希腊空域被破坏,数千人滞留在欧洲各地
items.summary: Thousands of passengers are stranded across Europe after a communications failure forced Greece to close its airspace, causing widespread cancellations and delays.
items.summary_zh: 数以千计的乘客被滞留在欧洲各地,因为一次通信故障迫使希腊关闭了领空,造成广泛的取消和延误.

items.title: Video shows Maduro's arrival in US and journey into custody
items.title_zh: 视频显示马杜罗抵达美国 并被拘押
items.summary: Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro and his wife Cilia Flores have been placed in custody at a New York detention centre after he was captured during US strikes on Caracas.
items.summary_zh: 委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯·马杜罗和妻子Cilia Flores在美国袭击加拉加斯时被俘后被拘押在纽约拘留中心.

items.title: 'Deeply shocked': World leaders react to US attack on Venezuela
items.title_zh: "深感震惊": 世界领导人对美国袭击委内瑞拉的反应
items.summary: Leaders around the world have responded with a mix of condemnation and support to the US capture of Venezuela's President Nicolás Maduro.
items.summary_zh: 全世界领导人的反应是谴责和支持美国俘虏委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯·马杜罗。

items.title: Trump warning over Iran protests 'reckless' says foreign minister
items.title_zh: 外相说,
items.summary: Donald Trump's warning that the US will intervene if peaceful protesters are killed was "reckless and dangerous", Iran's foreign minister has said.
items.summary_zh: 伊朗外交部长唐纳德·特朗普警告,如果和平抗议者被杀死,美国将进行干预,这"无畏而危险".

items.title: Watch: 'I'm so happy' - Venezuelans in the US react to Maduro's capture
items.title_zh: 委内瑞拉民众对马杜罗被捕的反应:
items.summary: US President Donald Trump says the US launched strikes on Venezuela and captured its President Nicolás Maduro.
items.summary_zh: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普说,美国对委内瑞拉发动了打击并俘虏了委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯·马杜罗.

items.title: Trump on Venezuela: 'We are going to run the country'
items.title_zh: 委内瑞拉的特朗普:"我们要管理这个国家".
items.summary: President Donald Trump announced that the US will run Venezuela until a 'proper transition can take place.'
items.summary_zh: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普宣布,

items.title: Explosions and smoke at La Guaira port
items.title_zh: 拉瓜伊拉港的爆炸和烟雾
items.summary: Port La Guaira is Caracas' main conduit to the Caribbean Sea, located in Miranda state.
items.summary_zh: 拉瓜伊拉港是加拉加斯通向加勒比海的主要通道,位于米兰达州.

items.title: Watch: Over 100 firefighters on the scene of Denver blaze
items.title_zh: 看:丹佛大火现场有100多名消防员
items.summary: The Colorado city of Denver was lit up by enormous fire on Friday evening, with over 100 firefighters on the scene to battle the blaze.
items.summary_zh: 科罗拉多州城市丹佛在星期五晚间被巨大的火灾所点燃,现场有超过100名消防员来与大火进行战斗.

items.title: Sailors saved from going over edge of huge dam
items.title_zh: 水手们从大坝上逃出
items.summary: Footage shows the moment four men were pulled to safety after spending hours dangling off the edge of a 40m (130ft) dam in South Africa.
items.summary_zh: 4名男子在南非40米(130英尺)水坝边上被拖走,

items.title: Watch: Moment 400-pound runaway prop injures Disney employee
items.title_zh: 看着:400磅跑道具 伤害了迪士尼员工
items.summary: Footage shows the moment a worker at Walt Disney World was injured after being hit by a 400-lb (180kg) runaway fake boulder prop.
items.summary_zh: Footage显示一名在华特迪士尼世界(Walt Disney World)的工人被一辆400磅(180克)跑去的假巨石道具撞倒后受伤.

items.title: What are Russians hoping for in 2026, asks Steve Rosenberg
items.title_zh: 2026年俄国人希望什么,问史蒂夫·罗森伯格
items.summary: As the New Year holiday gets underway, the BBC's Russia editor Steve Rosenberg asks people on the streets of Moscow about their hopes for 2026 and how they see their future.
items.summary_zh: 随着新年假期的到来,BBC的俄罗斯编辑史蒂夫·罗森伯格(Steve Rosenberg)询问莫斯科街头的人们对2026年的希望,以及他们如何看待自己的未来.
